q: The company announced a bold new direction yesterday by partnering with Microsoft on its mobile strategy to compete with Apple and Google. The problem is it will take years for investors to see results. This partnership won't bear fruit until 2013 and beyond, said Alkesh Shah, an analyst with Evercore Partners. The former American Idol judge was asked during a news conference whether viewers would see the`` old Simon Cowell '' or a different side to him when the show premieres on Fox later this year. Look, you adapt over the years, he replied.`` I started to cringe when I started to see people being booked as the so-called mean judge and just being gratuitously rude for the sake of it. I don't like that.
